Build a giant waterproof inflatable raft with a propeller to navigate across the water.
Use a hydrofoil board to glide across the water at high speeds.
Construct a series of underwater tunnels that connect different locations on opposite sides of the water.
Use a network of drones equipped with small propellers to transport passengers across the water.
Build a series of floating islands that can be connected by bridges or zip lines to form a network of transportation across the water.
